data.comment: The match has started.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tosu.
Tosu are caught offside.
In the minute 4, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a Shonan throw-in in Tosu's half.
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 8, Tosu push upfield but Yusuke Araki quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
In the minute 10, Tosu's Daichi Hayashi breaks free at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
Yusuke Araki awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Tosu are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Tosu have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
In the minute 17, Shonan to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tosu.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Shonan attack but Tarik Elyounoussi's header doesn't find the target.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shonan.
In the minute 23, The match at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka has been interrupted briefly for a check on Naoki Ishihara, who is down injured.
Bin Ukishima (Shonan) has taken off Naoki Ishihara who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Akimi Barada is the replacement.
Throw-in for Tosu at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Tosu.
In the minute 31, Tosu needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Kanagawa.
Free kick Tosu.
In the minute 33, Tosu drive upfield and Tiago Alves gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Throw-in Tosu.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 36, Daichi Hayashi of Tosu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tosu's half?
Tosu have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 40, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Yusuke Araki signals a Shonan throw-in in Tosu's half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tosu close to the penalty box.
Tosu surge into the attack at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka but Yuta Higuchiâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
In the minute 45, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Tosu's area.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Tiago Alves for Tosu has been booked by Yusuke Araki and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Kanagawa.
In the minute 46, Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 46, Tomoya Koyamatsu is replacing Takeshi Kanamori for the away team.
The away team replace Tiago Alves with Yoshiki Takahashi.
Bin Ukishima (Shonan) is making a second substitution, with Koki Tachi replacing Keisuke Saka.
Throw-in for Tosu at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 50, In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In Kanagawa, Tosu push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Tosu.
In the minute 59, Yusuke Araki awards Tosu a goal kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a Shonan throw-in in Tosu's half.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Tosu make their third substitution with Fuchi Honda replacing Kaisei Ishii.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tosu.
In the minute 69, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Shonan advance rapidly upfield but Yusuke Araki blows for offside.
Bin Ukishima is making the team's third substitution at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka with Yuto Iwasaki replacing Temma Matsuda.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Tosu at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Yusuke Araki awards Shonan a goal kick.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 74, Shonan drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 78, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Tosu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Tosu are whistled for offside.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a Shonan throw-in in Tosu's half.
In the minute 83, At Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka, Tosu are penalized for being offside.
Renzo Lopez is replacing Daichi Hayashi for Tosu at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Tosu at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Shonan needs to be cautious. Tosu have an attacking throw-in.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tosu.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Yusuke Araki signals a Tosu throw-in in Shonan's half.
Yusuke Araki will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tosu.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
The home team have replaced Mitsuki Saito with Satoshi Tanaka. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's fifth substitution at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka with Yuto Uchida replacing Yuta Higuchi.
